name: Next-Panel game panel development
short_description:
This project is related to an upcoming open source game server control panel.
It is related to have a lot of more performance than the current paid game server control panels-
This project consists in the website and server side.
The website is totally written in PHP with mysql, javascript, ajax, jquery, and so on.
The server side is totally written in python.[Due to obvious reasons, since this project will run in linux, python is one of the best languages to write it on]
This project will have the daily builds added on it.
